dw:transform-message.doc:name: Dw Transform Message tracking headers
dw:transform-message.dw:set-variable: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- { trackingMessageHeader: { applicationId: inboundProperties.applicationid, applicationUserId: inboundProperties.applicationuserid when inboundProperties.applicationuserid? otherwise inboundProperties.applicationid, consumerId: inboundProperties.consumerid when inboundProperties.consumerid? otherwise "test", messageId: inboundProperties.enterprisemessageid, conversationId: inboundProperties.conversationid when inboundProperties.conversationid? otherwise inboundProperties.applicationid, timeToLive: inboundProperties.timetolive when inboundProperties.timetolive? otherwise 45, messageDateTimeStamp: inboundProperties.messagedatetimestamp when inboundProperties.messagedatetimestamp? otherwise now } }
